Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that a Muslim judge in Montana ruled that a Muslim man can marry a 9-year-old girl, when in fact this did not happen.
Lack enough support: The claim does not provide any evidence or credible sources to support its assertion.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the marriage of a 9-year-old girl to a Muslim man was approved by a judge in Montana, without providing any evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider alternative explanations for the photo and the story, such as the possibility that it was staged or part of an advocacy campaign against child marriage.
